# Builders.to

> A members-only project launchpad for builders. Share your work in progress, get feedback from the community, and find your first users.

Builders.to is a community platform where indie hackers, solopreneurs, and developers share their projects at any stage—from idea to launched product. Members can upvote, comment, provide feedback, post daily updates, list services, find local builders, and engage with a growing ecosystem of makers who ship.

## Core Features

### Project Sharing
- **Projects**: Post your work at any stage (Idea → Building → Beta → Launched → Paused → Acquired). Free accounts can share up to 3 projects; Pro members get unlimited projects.
- **Co-Builders**: Credit multiple builders on a single project
- **Milestones**: Track and celebrate project milestones (v1 shipped, first user, first customer, $1k MRR, $10k MRR, profitable, first hire, funding, pivot)
- **Project Images**: Upload screenshots and media to showcase your work
- **Upvotes & Comments**: Community feedback and support system

### Community Feed
- **Daily Updates**: Share what you're building with text, images, GIFs, and videos
- **Activity Feed**: Real-time feed combining daily updates, milestones, new projects, job postings, and new member announcements
- **Likes & Comments**: Engage with other builders' updates
- **@Mentions**: Tag other builders in your updates

### Builder Profiles
- **Public Profiles**: Showcase your work, bio, headline, and social links
- **Builder Operating System Flags**: Signal if you're open to work, looking for a co-founder, or available for contract work
- **Streaks**: Track consecutive days of posting updates
- **Follows**: Follow builders you're interested in
- **Karma & Levels**: Earn karma points through contributions; level up from Newcomer to Legend

### Companies
- **Company Pages**: Create and manage company profiles with logo, about, tech stack, and tools
- **Traction Badges**: Display customer count, user count, revenue range, funding stage
- **Company Updates**: Post internal build logs and announcements
- **Team Members**: Add team members with roles (Owner, Admin, Member)
- **Job Board**: Post open roles (Full-time, Part-time, Contract, Freelance, Co-founder, Advisor, Intern)

### Services Marketplace
- **Service Listings**: Offer your builder services (MVP Build, Design, Marketing, AI Integration, DevOps, Audit)
- **Portfolio Projects**: Link your projects as proof-of-work for services
- **Stripe Connect**: Integrated payments for service purchases
- **Service Orders**: Track orders from pending to completed

### Builders Local (Classifieds)
- **Local Listings**: Craigslist-style classifieds by location
- **Categories**: Community, Services, Discussion, Coworking/Housing, For Sale
- **Location-Based**: Browse builders and services in your area
- **Ratings & Comments**: Rate listing authors and leave feedback

### Builder Map
- **Interactive World Map**: See where builders are located globally
- **Location Markers**: Visual pins for builders with approximate locations (privacy-offset)
- **Location-Based Discovery**: Find builders near your area

### Leaderboard
- **Top Builders**: Community leaderboard ranked by karma points and contributions
- **Karma Levels**: Newcomer, Contributor, Builder, Mentor, Legend
- **Karma Events**: Points earned for posting updates (+5), receiving likes (+2), commenting (+3), helpful comments (+10), launching projects (+25), project upvotes (+5), streak milestones, forming partnerships, and mentorship
- **Karma History**: Full history of karma point changes and events

### Accountability Partners
- **Partner Matching**: Find accountability partners building similar things based on interests and goals
- **Check-In System**: Regular check-ins with mood tracking (Crushing It, Good, Okay, Struggling)
- **Check-In Frequency**: Choose between daily, weekdays-only, or weekly check-ins
- **Partnership Status**: Partnerships can be Pending, Active, Paused, or Ended
- **Goal Tracking**: Stay on track with your building goals through partner accountability

### Direct Messaging
- **Private Messages**: Send text, images, and GIFs to other builders
- **Conversations**: Threaded conversation history with read receipts
- **Real-Time**: Instant message delivery and notifications

### Streamers Section
- **Live Streamers**: Discover builders who stream their work on Twitch
- **Featured Videos**: Showcase YouTube or Twitch videos on your profile

### Discover
- **Nearby Builders**: Find builders near you using browser geolocation
- **Similar Interests**: Connect with builders working on similar things
- **Tech Stack Matching**: Find builders with overlapping technologies
- **Building Category Matching**: Match by category (SaaS, Mobile App, AI/ML, Developer Tools, eCommerce, Fintech, Healthtech, Edtech, Marketplace, Agency, Content, Hardware)
- **Accountability Partner Discovery**: Find partners through the Discover dashboard

### Token System
- **Builder Tokens**: In-app currency earned through engagement
- **Welcome Bonus**: New users receive tokens on signup
- **Referral Rewards**: Earn tokens when you refer new builders
- **Streak Bonuses**: Earn tokens for maintaining daily update streaks
- **Profile Completion**: Earn tokens for completing your profile
- **Token Gifting**: Send tokens to other builders as appreciation
- **Token Redemption**: Use tokens to unlock ads, service listings, and local listings

### Advertising
- **Sidebar Ads**: Purchase ad placements visible on the feed
- **View & Click Tracking**: Analytics for ad performance
- **Token Redemption**: Optionally use tokens instead of payment

### Notifications & Communication
- **In-App Notifications**: Real-time notifications for likes, comments, mentions, and more
- **Push Notifications**: PWA push notifications (opt-in)
- **Email Digests**: Daily and weekly digest emails
- **Content Reporting**: Report inappropriate content

### Security
- **OAuth Authentication**: Sign in with Google, GitHub, or X/Twitter
- **Two-Factor Authentication**: Optional TOTP-based 2FA with backup codes

## Public Pages

- `/feed` - Main community feed with recent projects, updates, milestones, and jobs
- `/projects` - Browse all projects shared by the community
- `/projects/[slug]` - Individual project pages
- `/companies` - Discover companies built by community members
- `/companies/[slug]` - Individual company pages
- `/services` - Marketplace for builder services
- `/services/[id]` - Individual service listing pages

- `/listing/[slug]` - Individual local listing pages
- `/streamers` - Builders who live-stream their work
- `/leaderboard` - Top builders ranked by karma and contributions
- `/map` - Interactive world map of builder locations
- `/discover` - Discover similar builders, nearby builders, and accountability partners
- `/accountability` - Accountability partners dashboard with check-ins
- `/[slug]` - Public builder profiles

- `/articles` - Guides, tutorials, and resources for builders

- `/how-to/complete-your-profile` - Guide to setting up your profile

- `/how-to/advertise-on-builders` - How to run ads on Builders.to
- `/how-to/earn-from-posting` - How Pro members earn from quality content

- `/growth-hacks/build-in-public` - Complete guide to building in public

- `/privacy` - Privacy policy
- `/terms` - Terms of service

## Tech Stack

- **Framework**: Next.js 16 (App Router)
- **Language**: TypeScript
- **Database**: PostgreSQL with Prisma ORM
- **Authentication**: NextAuth.js v5 (OAuth: Google, GitHub, X/Twitter)
- **Payments**: Stripe (Checkout, Connect)
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **Icons**: Lucide React
- **Animations**: Motion (Framer Motion)
- **Email**: Resend
- **GIFs**: Giphy API
- **Push Notifications**: Web Push API
